items.name: Open
items.desc: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

items.name: In Progress
items.desc: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.

items.name: Resolved
items.desc: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

items.name: Closed
items.desc: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

items.name: 1xx
items.desc: Informational

items.name: 2xx
items.desc: Success
OK

items.name: 3xx
items.desc: Redirection
Not Modified

items.name: 4xx
items.desc: Client Error
Bad Request
Not Found

items.name: 5xx
items.desc: Server Error
Internal Server Error

items.name: Scheduled
items.desc: Flight is not airborne. Departure and arrival times are according to airline's schedule

items.name: Delayed
items.desc: Flight will depart 15 or more minutes after its scheduled departure time

items.name: Departed
items.desc: Flight has left the departure gate but may not be airborne yet

items.name: In Air
items.desc: Flight is airborne. Takeoff time is actual takeoff or 'wheels up' time

items.name: Landed
items.desc: Flight has landed. The landing time is actual touchdown or 'wheels down'

items.name: Arrived
items.desc: Flight has arrived at its destination gate

items.name: Cancelled
items.desc: Flight has been cancelled

items.name: Arrived at destination
items.desc: The shipment has arrived at the destination service center

items.name: Delivered
items.desc: The shipment has been delivered to the recipient

items.name: Follow-up on time
items.desc: Arrived on time, but a possible delay notification was sent

items.name: Late
items.desc: Your shipment will not be delivered today.
